meanings.meaning: chisel a person out of something

vlive.korean: 언제 갚을 건데! - 내년 이맘 때? When will you pay back? - Around this time next year? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 뫄 ❤ 🐻🐰
vlive.english: When will you pay back? - Around this time next year?

vlive.korean: 어... 그러면 돈을 빌려주면 언제까지 갚을 수가 있지? If I lend you, until when can you pay back? 듣기 View video 핵인싸 동맹 (HACKINSSA CREW) : [핵인싸 동맹] EP.26 완벽한 우정 테스트 (feat. 승기,일훈,산들,스윙스,소원,나래,동우,장준) HACKINSSA CREW
vlive.english: If I lend you, until when can you pay back?

vlive.korean: [내 동생 힘내] 곧 갚을 거야 파이팅! You'll pay it back soon. Fighting! 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : [빅픽처 in 베트남] 위험한 한탕(?)이 시작된다!
vlive.english: You'll pay it back soon. Fighting!

vlive.korean: 내가 금방 갚을 테니까... I'll pay you back so... 듣기 View video WHYNOT TV : [무엇이 무엇이 좋을값쇼] which is better? - EP08. 꿀 알바
이제 받았던 은혜를 갚을 차례니까요. It's my turn to pay back . 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN RADIO] 캐럿들 귀대귀대#24
vlive.english: It's my turn to pay back .

examples.korean: When are you going to repay them? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들에게는 (돈을) 언제 갚을 거예요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When are you going to repay them? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ll repay the money I owe them next week. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 다음주에 그들에게 빚진 돈을 갚을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ll repay the money I owe them next week. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I fully intend to repay them the money that they lent me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그들이 내게 빌려준 돈을 갚을 의사가 충분히 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I fully intend to repay them the money that they lent me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The company can no longer service its debts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 회사는 더 이상 부채에 대한 이자를 갚을 수가 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The company can no longer service its debts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: An angel in borrowing, a devil in repaying. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 빌릴 때는 천사요, 갚을 때는 악마다. (서양속담, 돈속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: An angel in borrowing, a devil in repaying. Add to Wordbook
